General.Name: Distribuidora de Gas Cuyana SA
General.Description: Distribuidora de Gas Cuyana S.A. distributes natural gas in the Córdoba, Mendoza, La Rioja, San Luis, Catamarca, and San Juan provinces of Argentina. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

0.Name: Ms. Natalia Lorena Rivero
